alert.note: Alert for Fairfield (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 20 at 10:16PM EDT until July 20 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN FAIRFIELD AND NORTHWESTERN HOCKING COUNTIES... At 1016 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bremen, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Logan, Bremen, Hide-A-Way Hills, Sugar Grove, Clearport, North Berne, Enterprise, Rockbridge and Hideaway Hills. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
